servinfo.title: Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Precautions of ECM Circuit Inspection:M16A and J20A

servinfo.ptxt: ECM and its circuits can be checked by measuring voltage, pulse signal and resistance with special tool connected.

attention2.ptxt: ECM cannot be checked by itself. It is strictly prohibited to connect voltmeter or ohmmeter to ECM with ECM connectors disconnected from it.

s1.ptxt: Remove ECM (1) from its bracket referring to Engine Control Module (ECM) Removal and Installation:M16A and J20A .
Connect special tool between ECM and ECM connectors securely.
Check voltage and/or pulse signal using voltmeter (2) and oscilloscope (3).

item.ptxt: As each terminal voltage is affected by battery voltage, confirm that it is 11 V or more when ignition switch is turned ON.
Voltage with asterisk (*) cannot be measured with voltmeter because it is pulse signal. Use oscilloscope for its check if necessary.
Before performed this inspection, be sure to read the Precautions of ECM Circuit Inspection:M16A and J20A .

Engine running at idle after warmed up engine.
Output signal is active low pulse. Pulse frequency varies depending on engine speed.

Signal is duty pulse. Duty ratio varies depending on vehicle condition.

topic.title: Reference waveform No.31

item.ptxt: After warmed up to normal operating temperature
Engine at cranking

s1.ptxt: Remove ECM from its bracket referring to Engine Control Module (ECM) Removal and Installation:M16A and J20A .

attention2.ptxt: Never touch terminals of ECM itself or connect voltmeter or ohmmeter (2).

s1.ptxt: Connect special tool to ECM connectors securely.

attention3.ptxt: Do not connect the other connector of special tool to ECM.

s1.ptxt: Check resistance between each pair of terminals of disconnected connectors (1) as listed in the following table.

item.ptxt: Be sure to connect ohmmeter probe from wire harness side of coupler.
Be sure to turn OFF ignition switch for this check.
Resistance in the following table represents that measured when parts temperature is 20 °C (68 °F).

entry.ptxt: Battery disconnected and ignition switch turned ON
Intake manifold tuning vacuum solenoid valve
